text: Those who would cast out their saviour and heir-presumptive soon enough find themselves at his mercy.
Determined bulwarks of the northern territories. Under no circumstances to be mistaken for the Warriors of the South.
What these warriors share, let no blade nor storm rend asunder.

Exhaustive records help to make sense of the chaos.
The masses are power's mighty rock.
Villains to a man, but they do it with such impeccable panache.
Five renowned warriors, their prowess supposedly unmatched. Until now.
Stalwart and proud warriors of the southlands. Absolutely never to be confused with the Northern Defenders.
Train day and night, fight seldomly.
Those who cannot learn from history are doomed to repeat it.
